|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL128P90TFCR2; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H511638D-UCB3; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6065; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:23:97 |oui = 00:24:D2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/09/2007 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Askey WLL3090 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3052-009680" is silkscreened on the main board. ''Askey'' is the presumed manufacturer. :A typical ''Askey'' MAC label (same font / format) is also affixed to the board. :"3017-000660" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :It is presumed to be an [[Askey WLL3090]]. There are two [[Marvell]] 88E6065 Switch chips on the board. :The device uses two ''Entropic Communications'' EN2210 :for the coaxial ([http://www.mocalliance.org/ MoCA]) connections.
CPU: [[Infineon]] ([[Lantiq]]) XWAYâ„¢ TwinPass-E (PXB 4000 E)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=56219 On the DD-WRT forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=27106 On the OpenWrt forums] :Terrible quality pictures are available [http://s1018.photobucket.com/albums/af308/rtoledo2002/Westel_9100_internals/ here].
